poems.name: ఆలయం (Aalayam)
poems.author: ఒక తెలుగు కవి
poems.description: This poem talks about the sanctity of temples and the peace and joy found through the path of devotion.
poems.meaning: The poem illustrates that people seeking devotion find peace in temples, emphasizing the value of inner tranquility and meditation.

poems.name: పశుపతి (Pashupati)
poems.author: జయశంకర్
poems.description: This poem highlights the grandeur of Pashupati (Lord Shiva) and his power to govern the universe.
poems.meaning: Pashupati, the mighty lord, governs the universe with divine power, and this poem emphasizes the growth of inner strength and righteousness.

poems.name: చిత్రంగా (Chitranga)
poems.author: ఒక తెలుగు కవి
poems.description: A philosophical reflection on how life unfolds through varied experiences and colors.
poems.meaning: The poem explores the ever-changing and vibrant nature of life, filled with different paths, emotions, and lessons.

poems.name: మనసు (Manasu)
poems.author: ప్రముఖ కవి
poems.description: This poem delves into the complexities of the human heart and the transforming nature of love and hope.
poems.meaning: It reflects how love, hope, and determination shape the mind and how thoughts influence the course of emotions.

poems.name: వెన్నెల (Vennela)
poems.author: తెలుగు కవి
poems.description: A poem that connects the moonlight with the inner strength of an individual and how hope leads to a bright future.
poems.meaning: It compares moonlight as a metaphor for hope, showing that inner faith can illuminate even the darkest moments.

poems.name: గాలితో కలిసిన నది (Gaali To Kalisa Nadi)
poems.author: సిద్ధార్థ్
poems.description: A reflection on life’s journey and the impact of external forces like nature that guide one's destiny.
poems.meaning: The poem uses nature’s elements, wind, and river, to symbolize how life’s direction changes through internal and external forces.

poems.name: నక్షత్రాలు (Nakshatralu)
poems.author: ఆది కవి
poems.description: Explores the relationship between stars and the earthly world, and how ancient wisdom guides the present.
poems.meaning: The poem discusses the celestial connection and how the teachings of the past can still influence the present life.

poems.name: ప్రేమ (Prema)
poems.author: రామకృష్ణ
poems.description: A love poem that describes how love, faith, and trust guide the path of hearts intertwined together.
poems.meaning: Love shines bright like a radiant light when hearts are united, and trust is built.

poems.name: మనస్సు (Manassu)
poems.author: మధుర కవి
lines: మనసు మళ్ళీ మరొక దారిలో అడుగులు వేస్తుంది.
poems.description: A poetic exploration of the restless nature of the human mind and the constant battle between thoughts and emotions.
poems.meaning: The poem reflects how the mind constantly shifts between joy and sorrow, seeking peace amidst chaos.

poems.name: శాంతి (Shanti)
poems.author: సంగీత్
poems.description: This poem talks about the continuous search for peace and the path to spiritual fulfillment.
poems.meaning: The poem emphasizes that inner peace is the ultimate goal that can be found through spiritual exploration and depth.
